title: Library Tech for Future Leaders
short: Equip Southside High School’s library with laptops and digital resources to close the technology gap for students.
description: The Southside High School Library currently has fewer than 10 working laptops available for its 1,200 students. Many students rely on the library for research, homework, and college applications, yet lack the tools they need to succeed. This campaign will fund 50 new Chromebooks, upgraded Wi-Fi, and subscriptions to essential academic databases. Your support ensures that students in one of Atlanta’s most underserved neighborhoods have equal opportunities to excel academically and prepare for college and careers. By donating, you are helping us build a future where every student can thrive through access to the technology they need.

updates.content: Hi there, this is an update!
